title: Google\Cloud\Dlp\V2\FieldTransformation
name: FieldTransformation
description:
The transformation to apply to the field.

Generated from protobuf message google.privacy.dlp.v2.FieldTransformation

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.fields
params.description: Required. Input field(s) to apply the transformation to.

params.name: data.condition
params.description: Only apply the transformation if the condition evaluates to true for the given RecordCondition. The conditions are allowed to reference fields that are not used in the actual transformation. Example Use Cases: - Apply a different bucket transformation to an age column if the zip code column for the same record is within a specific range. - Redact a field if the date of birth field is greater than 85.

params.name: data.primitive_transformation
params.description: Apply the transformation to the entire field.

params.name: data.info_type_transformations
params.description: Treat the contents of the field as free text, and selectively transform content that matches an InfoType.

methods.description:

Only apply the transformation if the condition evaluates to true for the given RecordCondition. The conditions are allowed to reference fields that are not used in the actual transformation.

Example Use Cases:

  • Redact a field if the date of birth field is greater than 85.
